category.name: Change Management
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CM_enable_global_change_context
preference.preference_description: Specifies whether UI element to set Global Change Context is displayed or not. Valid Values: * true: Change Context option is displayed in UI ( i.e. User Setting panel in RAC, Header in Active Workspace ). * false: Change Context option is not displayed in UI.
